about_the_game:
Where do monsters of the world go after Halloween? When the towns are already terrorized? What about those kind-hearted monsters who’d just prefer a quiet life away from human judgment?

It just so happens that Doctor Malice has opened her castle gates to all monsters- scaley, slimey, or covered in fur. All are welcome to stay as long as they please... so long as they volunteer for an experiment here or there.

But life in Shiverfall Peaks isn’t as peaceful as the monsters hoped. Local villagers soon became aware of the outcasts’ refuge, and did what they do best- form an angry mob!

Will you let them run your monstrous crew out with torches and pitchforks, or will you fight for your place in this wicked world?

  • Recruit a plethora of classic monsters to aid in battle. Zombies, Witches, and Ghosts, OH MY!

  • The Slingshot causes physics-based destruction to village structures. Fling everything from Toads to Pumpkin Heads to even your monster residents for monstrous damage and devilish status effects.

  • Spend gold to repair and upgrade your castle defenses between battles. Build an impenetrable fortress of fear that no villager dare enter.

  • Customize the looks and names of your monsters. Upgrade and equip them with powerful gear and mad science experiments. Be careful about getting too attached to your residents, however. Even in a castle full of the undead, permadeath is a killer!

short_description: Manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction!
